changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE [Plantilla] ( [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY, [Nombre] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL, [Version] nvarchar(255) NULL, [FechaVigencia] date NOT NULL, [GrupoDocumentoId] int NOT NULL, [EncabezadoId] int NULL, [PiePaginaId] int NULL, [DocumentoId] int NOT NULL, [CuerpoDocumento] text NOT NULL, [EstadoRegistro] varchar(10) NULL, [CreadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaCreacion] datetime2 NULL, [ModificadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaModificacion] datetime2 NULL, [EliminadoPor] varchar(255) NULL, [FechaEliminacion] datetime2 NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Plantilla] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]), CONSTRAINT [FK_Plantilla_Documento_DocumentoId] FOREIGN KEY ([DocumentoId]) REFERENCES [Documento] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT [FK_Plantilla_ComplementoPlantilla_EncabezadoId] FOREIGN KEY ([EncabezadoId]) REFERENCES [ComplementoPlantilla] ([Id]) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT [FK_Plantilla_GrupoDocumento_GrupoDocumentoId] FOREIGN KEY ([GrupoDocumentoId]) REFERENCES [GrupoDocumento] ([Id]) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT [FK_Plantilla_ComplementoPlantilla_PiePaginaId] FOREIGN KEY ([PiePaginaId]) REFERENCES [ComplementoPlantilla] ([Id]) ON DELETE NO ACTION ); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Plantilla_DocumentoId] ON [Plantilla] ([DocumentoId]); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Plantilla_EncabezadoId] ON [Plantilla] ([EncabezadoId]); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Plantilla_GrupoDocumentoId] ON [Plantilla] ([GrupoDocumentoId]); GO CREATE INDEX [IX_Plantilla_PiePaginaId] ON [Plantilla] ([PiePaginaId]); GO
